product_name: Klean Kanteen Vacuum-Insulated Canister - 8 fl. oz.
long_description: Use the Klean Kanteen Vacuum-Insulated canister to stock up on goodies at the bulk section of your local market or to head out on the trail with a hot lunch that you can enjoy atop the summit. Canisters are great for storing food at home or taking with you to work, school or into the mountains; vacuum insulation keeps food hot or cold during your journey. Tough 18/8 food-grade stainless steel is BPA free; doesn't absorb food flavors or odors. Klean Kanteen Vacuum-Insulated canister has a wide lid opening that allows for easy scooping, pouring and cleaning. Stainless-steel lid has a spot for labeling the contents of the canister with a marker or grease pencil (not included). Hand washing recommended.
short_description: Use the Klean Kanteen Vacuum-Insulated canister to stock up on goodies at the bulk section of your local market or to head out on the trail with a hot lunch that you can enjoy atop the summit.
